headerDisplay: This plugin works with Mitsubishi Air Conditioner, Heat Pump and Energy Recovery Ventilation connected to MELCloud and MELCloud Home. Devices are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually [paired](https://github.com/grzegorz914/homebridge-melcloud-control/wiki#adding-to-homekit).

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Select accessory control type displayed in HomeKit app.

heatDryFanMode.title: Heat
heatDryFanMode.description: Select the operating mode for Heat, if this mode is not supported, it will be disabled.

coolDryFanMode.title: Cool
coolDryFanMode.description: Select the operating mode for Cool, if this mode is not supported, it will be disabled.

autoDryFanMode.title: Auto
autoDryFanMode.description: Select the operating mode for Auto, if this mode is not supported, it will be disabled.

temperatureSensor.title: Room
temperatureSensor.description: This enable extra room temperature sensor to use with automations in HomeKit app.

temperatureOutdoorSensor.title: Outdoor
temperatureOutdoorSensor.description: This enable extra outdoor temperature sensor to use with automations in HomeKit app.

inStandbySensor.title: In Standby
inStandbySensor.description: This enable in standby mode sensor to use with automations in HomeKit app.

connectSensor.title: Connect
connectSensor.description: This enable connect state sensor to use with automations in HomeKit app.

errorSensor.title: Error
errorSensor.description: This enable error sensor to use with automations in HomeKit app.

frostProtectionSupport.title: Frost Protection Support
frostProtectionSupport.description: This enable extra frost protection control and sensors to use with automations in HomeKit app.

overheatProtectionSupport.title: Overheat Protection Support
overheatProtectionSupport.description: This enable extra overheat protection control and sensors to use with automations in HomeKit app.

holidayModeSupport.title: Holiday Mode Support
holidayModeSupport.description: This enable extra holiday mode control and sensors to use with automations in HomeKit app.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description: Set the background device state refresh time in seconds.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Select the characteristic type to be displayed in HomeKit app.

name.title: Name
name.description: Your own name displayed in Homebridge/HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for preset name.

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

clientId.title: Client Id
clientId.description: Here optional set the Client Id of MQTT Broker.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

user.title: User
user.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

passwd.title: Password
passwd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.
